Edges-Power -- Male Human Veteran Wizard
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d4 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d8
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Riding: (agi) d4
Notice: (sma) d6 Science: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Bonded Object: Gains +1 Spellcasting when object held or worn
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Erastil (Good)
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 20
Features
Edges (13 points): Arcane Armor: 2; Artificer: 1; Bonded Object: 1; Channeling: 1; Concentration: 1; Holy/Unholy Warrior: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 2; Power Surge: 1; Soul Drain: 1; Wizard: 1 Hindrances: Driven; Enemy; Vow+ Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbooks features
Driven: Personal goal affects decision-making
Enemy: Individual or remote group wants character eliminated
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Vow+: Has tight restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 5 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Starknife (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Starknife Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 20
Powers:
Blind: (2 PP Necr) R10" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Shape Change: (3+ PP Tran) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Effects last 5 min; +2/+3 PP Effect willing target at range touch/10")
Speak Language: (1 PP Divi) R10" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target understands all languages; +5 PP All within 10" radius can understand each other)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +10 Power Points
Arcane Armor: May cast spells in medium armor w/out penalty
Artificer: May give items arcane powers
Channeling: Raise on arcane skill roll reduces Power Point cost by 1
Concentration: Power duration doubled
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add equal amount to Soak roll
Power Surge: Joker Action Card restores 10 Power Points
Soul Drain: May suffer fatigue to recover 5 Power Points
Spellbooks: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
